Uses of Class
qahramon.Character

  • Packages that use Character 
    Package Description
    qahramon  
    qahramon.exceptions  

    • Uses of Character in qahramon

      Subclasses of Character in qahramon 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Hero
      A class of heroes as special kinds of characters involving strength.
      class  Monster
      A class of monsters as special kinds of characters involving capacity, protection and damage.
      Methods in qahramon that return Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Character Item.getCharacter()
      Return the item's character.
      Character Item.getHolder()
      Return the holder of this item.
      Methods in qahramon with parameters of type Character 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Item.canHaveAsCharacter(Character character)
      Check whether this item can have the given character.
      void Character.collectTreasures(Character character)
      This character collects the treasures it wants to take found on a dead character.
      void Character.giveTo(Item item, Character character)
      Try to give an item to the given character.
      void Monster.hit(Character character)
      This monster hits the given character.
      abstract void Character.hit(Character character)
      This character hits the given character.
      void Hero.hit(Character character)
      Make the character hit the given character.

    • Uses of Character in qahramon.exceptions

      Return the character involved in this DeadException.
      Constructors in qahramon.exceptions with parameters of type Character 
      Constructor and Description
      DeadException(Character character)
      Initialize this new DeadException involving the given character
